description:
You're grounded again for something totally unfair, but your friends are hanging out at the arcade tonight and you CANNOT miss it! In Schoolboy Escape, you play as a clever teen with a talent for creative problem-solving who must devise the perfect plan to sneak out for an evening of fun while the house is on high alert.

Key Features:

Master the Art of Distraction: Create clever diversions using everyday household items to redirect attention away from your escape route
Navigate Dynamic Security: Family members have unique patrol patterns, areas of focus, and levels of awareness that change based on your actions
Transform Ordinary Objects: Turn remote controls, toys, household tech and more into sophisticated tools for your master escape plan
Multiple Escape Routes: Each exit presents different challenges and opportunities - from bedroom windows to basement doors
Real-time Strategy: Timing is everything! One misplaced item or poorly timed move could send you back to square one
Escalating Challenges: Progress through increasingly complex scenarios requiring multi-stage plans and perfect execution
Neighborhood Freedom: Successfully escape to meet your waiting friends and enjoy bonus arcade mini-games as your reward

From simple sneaking to elaborate multi-stage plans worthy of a Hollywood heist, Schoolboy Escape turns everyday suburban life into the ultimate puzzle-solving adventure!
Your friends are waiting, the arcade is calling - time to prove you're the mastermind of mischief!
